description:
This extension add a switch to the WiFi menu, in the GNOME system menu, that show a QrCode of the active connection.

This can be useful for quickly connecting devices capable of reading QrCode and applying the settings to the system, without having to type in the name and the password of the WiFi. (e.g. Android Smartphone).
name: Wifi QrCode
